name: Aspargo Knight
description:
He lost memory and now.... he's a banana! Play as a mysterious individual who's trying to understand his past and what happenned as hordes of evil vegetables try to end the fruits and lead them to extinction. Our hero is then tasked to deliver an odd asparagus and escape the dungeon in which he was imprisioned to break this curse cast upon him and win this war against the vegetable minions.

This game is a 2D Side-Scroller Platformer made in Unity as a project for my Video Game Design course. It's being developed by a group of 4 people and it already has the following content:

     -> 3 unique levels each introducing the player to new mechanics and enemies;

     -> Each level with their own tile sets to make them even more visually unique;

     -> 2 dropable items including jump boots for a double jump;

     -> A variety of different enemies and traps (more to come!);

     -> Challenging levels with platforming mechanics such as wall climbing and double               jump.

The game is still not in it's final state and we're still implementing new content as time goes. Hope you like it and fun playing!
